    • F-Flat

    F♭ (pronounced F-flat) is a toy language.

    Project maintained by Hypercubed Hosted on GitHub Pages — Theme by mattgraham

    Five interesting facts about F♭ (#fflat):

    1. It’s concatenative:

    http://evincarofautumn.blogspot.com/2012/02/why-concatenative-programming-matters.html

    1. It’s arbitrary precision:

    https://runkit.com/hypercubed/numerical-differentiation

    1. All values are immutable, using structural sharing:

    Internally using https://github.com/aearly/icepick.

    1. Actions can be undone:

    1. F♭ is a super set of JSON:

    Bonus. It’s my model train.
